arabicText: الٓر ۚ كِتَـٰبٌ أُحْكِمَتْ ءَايَـٰتُهُۥ ثُمَّ فُصِّلَتْ مِن لَّدُنْ حَكِيمٍ خَبِيرٍ
englishTranslationText:
Alif-Lam-Ra*;	“This	is	a	Book,	the	verses	of	which	
are	 full	 of	 wisdom	 - then	 explained	 in	 detail	 -
from	 the	Wise,	 the	Well	 Aware.”	 (*Alphabets of 
the Arabic language; Allah and to whomever He 
reveals, know their precise meanings.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Alif-Lam-Ra*;	 “Yeh	 ek	 kitāb	 hai	 jis	 ki	 āyateiñ	
hikmat	 bhari	 haiñ	 phir	 tafseel	 ki	 gayiñ	 hikmat	
wāle	khabardār	ki	taraf	se.”
(*Arabi zabān ke wo Huroof jinke Ma’āni Allah 
or Jis par Allah Ta’āla ne inko Nazil farmaya 
Wahi Janta hai.)

arabicText: أَلَّا تَعْبُدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّنِى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌۭ وَبَشِيرٌۭ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ki bandagi	na	karo	magar	Allāh ki	beshak	maiñ	
tumhāre	liye	us	ki	taraf	se	dar	aur	khushi	sunāne	
wālā	huñ.

arabicText: وَأَنِ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ يُمَتِّعْكُم مَّتَـٰعًا حَسَنًا إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّۭى وَيُؤْتِ كُلَّ ذِى فَضْلٍۢ فَضْلَهُۥ ۖ وَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَإِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍۢ كَبِيرٍ
englishTranslationText:
. “And	ask	forgiveness	from	your	Lord	and	incline	towards	Him	in	repentance,	He	will	provide	you	excellent	
sustenance	until	the	appointed	time	and	will	bestow	superiority	to	every	one	who	excels;	and	if	you	turn	
away,	I	then	fear	the	punishment	of	the	Great	Day	upon	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yeh	ke	apne	Rab	se	mu’āfi	māñgo	phir	us	ki	 taraf	 taubā	karo	 tumheiñ	bahut	achchā	baratnā	 (fāida)	
dega	ek	therāye	w’ade	tak	Aur	har	fazilat	wāle	ko	is	kā	fazl	pahuñchāye	gā	aur	agar	muñh	phero	to	maiñ	
tum	par	bade	din	ke	‘azāb	ka	khauf	kartā	hooñ.

arabicText: إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَرْجِعُكُمْ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌ
englishTranslationText: “To	Allah only	you	have	to	return,	and	He	is	Able	to	do	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText: . Tumheiñ	Allāh	hi	ki	taraf	phirnā	hai	aur	woh	har	sha’e	par	qādir	hai

arabicText: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمْ يَثْنُونَ صُدُورَهُمْ لِيَسْتَخْفُوا۟ مِنْهُ ۚ أَلَا حِينَ يَسْتَغْشُونَ ثِيَابَهُمْ يَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
englishTranslationText:
Pay	heed!	They	fold	up	their	breasts	in	order	to	conceal	from	Allah;	pay	heed!	Even	when	they	fully	cover	
themselves	 up	with	 their	 clothes,	Allah knows	 all	 that	what	 hide	 and	 all	what	 they	 disclose;	indeed	He	
knows	what	is	in	the	hearts.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Suno!	Woh	 apne	 seene	 dohre	 karte	 (muñh	 chupāte)	 haiñ	 ke	 Allāh	 se	pardā	 kareiñ; suno! Jis	 waqt	 woh	
apne	kapdoñ	se	sārā	badan	dhānp	lete	haiñ, us	waqt	bhi	Allāh	un	kā	chupā	aur	zāhir	sab	kuch	jāntā	hai,
beshak	Woh	diloñ	ki	bāt	jānne	wālā	hai.
